document.full_text: libyan state television carried brief audio remarks it said were by leader muammar gaddafi on friday in which he taunted nato as a cowardly crusader and said he was in a place they could not reach.
document.title: libyan tv carries audio of gaddafi taunting nato
lines_and_colors: libyan state television carried brief audio remarks it said were by leader muammar gaddafi on friday in which he taunted nato as a cowardly crusader and said he was in a place they could not reach.
